attributes.title: Tiktok🥰

attributes.review: This app just kept on making my phone crash constantly no matter what app I was on and I don’t even have an old phone and I’m not the only one like I have in iPhone 8plus and It kept on crashing and this is a recently bought phone so I was confused at first so I just shut down my phone and turned it back on and it was still shutting down and it was still crashing and it was really annoying and over all a waste of time just downloading it in the first place
attributes.title: DELETED

attributes.review: in search of an app to fill the void that will be created if tik tok is taken down. this did not suffice. do not recommend.
attributes.title: yikes

attributes.review:
Let me just start out with saying this if I could rate this 0 stars I would! But I am a mother and married women. So I made my 3 kids and husband get the app to support the president! But what I saw on everyone’s phones after have the app for 1 week everyone had porn pop up apps! This is NOT okay! They need to shut the app down so other families don’t have to go through this! As a mother I am mortified! 

- Susan Smith
attributes.title: Pornographic images on this app

attributes.review: When Trump creates an app, it’s not the best. They’re not sending you, they’re sending apps that have lots of problems and they’re bringing those problems. They’re bringing bugs, they’re bringing viruses . They’re bringing glitches, and some I assume, are good features.
attributes.title: This isn’t it

attributes.review: Be careful with good food: I’ve never been so mad in my life... I downloaded this app right after I got myself a yummy croissant I placed it on the table and wait....😤 when I came back it was gone it vanished I just wanted to go wash my hands u know bc the pandemic and all and when I looked in the bag I shed a few tears I’m not trying to be dramatic but... I’m about to be dramatic. I thought it couldn’t get any worse than that but I found out my dog ate it yes the app didn’t steal it...😔 but it’s manipulated my dog into stealing it. My friend told me my dog ate it and I should not be having a heart attack like I am now but I know my dog would never dew such thing that’s so cruel. 😶 so I deleted tha app and even got my phone replaced a few weeks later it still haunts me and still to this day I wonder where is my croissant really at🤔😞 not only did to control my own dog but my phone to I can’t seem to do anything without feeling like it’s being controlled or something sane with my dog she just hasent been the same lately 😰
attributes.title: Stole My Croissant 🥐😠 pure evil 100%😎
